text:
Created attachment 24715
Patch lock field that should be final

A field that is used as a lock should be final. 

org.apache.catalina.ha.session.DeltaSession.diffLock

is protected and mutable.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 24716
Patch fields that should be final

Two more locks that need protection.

In the case of MultiLockFairBlockingQueue, the array was final, but needs to be private to prevent accidental or malicious changes.
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Thanks for the patches. These have been applied to trunk.
